3: As you can see, this is my chamber.

2: You've got what you want. How about me?

3: You want to see Liv, right? Here... I will show you the image.
Liv is in the northeastern part of the desert, a temporary base of your Joint Task Force.
As you can tell, my servants are lying deep underneath the sand, observing everything.
The Joint Task Force, the Gray Ravens, the Goldfinches, the Purifying Force... I can see your every move.
The moment you entered my domain, you have been under my watchful eyes.
You are not yet worthy to speak in front of me.
Watch yourself extra carefully within my chamber.
My servants are capable of way more than just observing.

2: What is it that you want?

3: I... have ever only wanted one thing...
Infinite golden dust shimmers in the air behind Nat.
(Opens the retriever) It's shorted out again... Is the sand too small for it?
I'll have to block the vent of the analysis kiln. It'll overheat... but it's the only way.
I can't let the sand fall inside the vent. I'll have to switch to another sample if the retriever's shorted out again.
